items.title: Caterpillar (CAT) Exceeds Market Returns: Some Facts to Consider
items.description: The latest trading day saw Caterpillar (CAT) settling at $366.23, representing a +1.58% change from its previous close.

items.title: An ‘impossible’ PIP revives age bias lawsuit against Caterpillar
items.description: The plaintiff had already won an age-discrimination jury verdict against the company years before.
